formatted_address: 25 Springside Green, #01-14 The Brooks II, Singapore 786015
name: Daruma Tavern

reviews.text:
Food is fantastic! Would totally come here again with my family!
The service is fast and efficient and the bosses here are super friendlyðŸ¤© if youâ€™re someone who likes beer and delicious food, you have to try! Both outlets are as good! Both outdoor and indoor sitting is amazingðŸ¤©

Interesting Japanese-inspired cosy restaurant with fusion menu consisting of Western brunch, Japanese food, Thai style bites and local delights. Dishes tasted not bad in general, prices are considered quite high.

This used to be one of the better Hokkien mees around, with lots of flavour and good wok hei on most days. I had not eaten it for a few months but when I had it again today, to my surprise it was very different and really not good.

It feels like a completely different recipe or chef who cooked it - colour was very yellow instead of the usual light brown-ish colour, and the alkaline taste in the yellow mee was very strong. The broth/gravy was not as flavourful as before, with a weak seafood flavour and no wok hei. The broth also did not cling to the noodles as much as before and was rather soupy, which also suggests that the recipe is different.

The only thing that felt the same was the chilli, which was still quite bright and spicy, and unfortunately this overwhelmed the entire dish since the other ingredients were not as flavourful.

Will not return again after this time.

Fantastic food and drinks. Great environment too. Bestest place to chill n relax with Friends and loved ones. Bring your friends and you can savour every single dish together. Absolutely will come back again and again and again.
Had lunch there & ordered a mushroom soup, salmon salad & black coffee. Relatively quiet during weekdays. Food was fresh & good, worth trying when one around that area, looking for chill place.
